electronic_signatures.summary: Court recognized validity of advanced electronic signatures under ETA 2019
electronic_signatures.relevance: Establishes precedent for electronic signature validity
key_principles: Electronic signatures have same legal weight as handwritten
Advanced electronic signatures provide higher certainty

contract_formation.case_name: Namibian Business Solutions v. Tech Innovations (Pty) Ltd
contract_formation.summary: Electronic contract formation via email exchanges held valid
contract_formation.relevance: Confirms electronic contract validity in commercial context
key_principles: Offer and acceptance can occur electronically
Intent to create legal relations must be clear

contract_formation.case_name: Consumer Protection Board v. Online Services Ltd
contract_formation.summary: Consumer protection requirements in electronic transactions
contract_formation.relevance: Establishes consumer protection standards for electronic contracts
key_principles: Cooling-off period must be clearly communicated
Electronic consent must be informed and voluntary

data_retention.case_name: Audit Authority v. Digital Records Corp
data_retention.summary: Electronic record retention requirements for compliance
key_principles: Electronic records must maintain integrity over time
Audit trails are essential for compliance
Proper backup and recovery systems required

south_african_influence.relevance: Influential precedent for SADC region electronic signature law
south_african_influence.applicability_to_namibia: Persuasive authority due to similar legal framework
